summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Finanzas 4.0 financial system. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly. System ready for production use.
passed_tests: Backend API health check - API and database connectivity working
Dashboard KPIs endpoint - All 8 KPI fields present and correct
Seed data verification - Empresa, monedas (PEN/USD), categor√≠as, cuentas financieras, proveedor demo all created
CRUD Proveedores - Create, read, and list operations working
CRUD Facturas Proveedor - Create with automatic totals calculation (subtotal, IGV, total)
Automatic CxP creation - CxP records created automatically when factura is saved
Pagos functionality - Partial payments working with correct saldo_pendiente updates
Letras functionality - Generation from facturas working with estado changes to 'canjeado'
Frontend Dashboard - Loads correctly with all 8 KPI cards displaying financial data
Frontend Navigation - Sidebar navigation working between Dashboard and Facturas Proveedor
Facturas Proveedor UI - Page loads, Nueva Factura button works, modal opens correctly
Factura Creation Form - All form fields working (proveedor select, beneficiario, line items)
End-to-end Factura Creation - Form submission creates factura and appears in list
Filter functionality - Estado filter working correctly
UI Integration - Frontend successfully integrates with backend APIs
